code: import axios from'axios';import API_BASE_URL from'../config';const getTotalPoints=async token=>{try{if(!token){throw new Error('No token available');}const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/total-points/"),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});return response.data;}catch(error){throw new Error(error);}};export default getTotalPoints;
